meta.name: description
meta.content: R-OSGi provides a transparent way to access services on remote OSGi service platforms. Additionally, it implements OSGi R4 EventAdmin service and is able to send RemoteEvents to other peers. It uses jSLP, the pure Java SLP implementation as underlying discovery protocol.
